channel.title: Client help please
channel.description:
ok...i have a couple of questions.
1. how do i change the backround image of the client.
2. how do i change the symbol for the protect prayers
3. how do i change the effects of the prayers (not sure if this is client or source)

item.title: Client help please
item.dc:creator: @sexy_bobert sexy bobert
item.description:
@sexy_bobert wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:1, topic:258007”]ok…i have a couple of questions.

  1. how do i change the backround image of the client.

  2. how do i change the symbol for the protect prayers

  3. how do i change the effects of the prayers (not sure if this is client or source)[/quote]

  4. Changing the background… Right click on the picture that is currently saved as the background image in the files of the client. Than open it with pain or something than overwrite another image with it.

  5. Changing the protection prayer icons… It should be in sprites, you can just do the same as before, over writing it.

  6. Don’t know, sorry. I’ve never tried it.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help please
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“njr99, post:1, topic:258007”]ok…i have a couple of questions.

  1. how do i change the backround image of the client.

  2. how do i change the symbol for the protect prayers

  3. how do i change the effects of the prayers (not sure if this is client or source)[/quote]

  4. Replace the current image in the client folder. The new image must be the same size and name of the old one.

  5. Edit the sprites.

  6. This is server-sided. Most likely in something such as a PrayerHandler or the client class.

Read full topic
